  • Method Details

    • touchDown

      public boolean touchDown(int screenX, int screenY, int pointer, int button)
      Handles touch input events and triggers the Companion's attack.
      Specified by:
      touchDown in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
      Overrides:
      touchDown in class InputComponent
      Parameters:
      screenX - The x-coordinate of the touch event on the screen.
      screenY - The y-coordinate of the touch event on the screen.
      pointer - The pointer ID for the touch event.
      button - The button ID for the touch event.
      Returns:
      True if the input was processed, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • InputProcessor.touchDown(int, int, int, int)
